E

EventController<T extends org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerEvent & org.bukkit.event.Cancellable> - Interface in me.bristermitten.plumber.struct.event
A wrapper for handling events that provides simple boilerplate handling Currently, only supports Cancellable instances of PlayerEvent All instances have an EventPriority of EventPriority.NORMAL For performance reasons, if no handling functionality is defined, the controller is not registered into Bukkit
EventControllerFactory - Class in me.bristermitten.plumber.struct.event
Simple factory class for creating instances of EventController Can't use Guice because of generics, so currently stuck to EventControllerImpl
